metadata.title: CVE-2021-46911 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ch_ktls: Fix kernel panic Taking page refcount is not ideal and causeskernel panic sometimes. It's better to take tx_ctx lock for the completeskb transmit, to avoid page cleanup if ACK received in middle.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
